title: Neelam Solstice
hc:
Neelam Solstice is a new residential venture placed in Ghatkopar East Mumbai. This undertaking has an opportunistic land which is well linked to a number of prominent destinations in Mumbai. Recently the location has seen a lot of developments when you look at the roads and various other public resources in comparison to other areas.


Neelam Solstice includes well built residences of 2BHK and 3BHK flats in a gated area. Each individual residential unit offered here include ample useable space in the combined developed area of 1300 to 1835 square feet separately. These flats have superior indoor specifications along with mastered layout and construction. Also, its properly placed big windows and well planned balconies will make sure proper ventilation and natural light inside each apartment.


Neelam Solstice further presents a tranquil natural lifestyle with a number of favorable amenities and comforts. These outdoor features comprise of manicured gardens and enough green space offering dedicated walking and jogging tracks, with sufficient parking space. This venture additionally has a wide range of premium amenities like a large sized Clubhouse, pool and various indoor & outdoor recreation facilities. Additionally, developer has also provided a comfy living space with full power backup and round the clock water facility. Safety at this venture is guaranteed with modern-day equipment and planning like RCC framed structures, CCTV surveillance, fire fighting units and adequate manned patrolling inside the residential compound.


This venture is developed by Neelam Realtors Pvt. Ltd., a reputable name in the real-estate world of Mumbai. The Group has delivered several residential and commercial projects throughout the city and their association is recognized for its rigorous and detailed work.
unittable:

2 BHK (1320 sq.ft.) 1320 15000 1.98 Cr
